-- 1. Tymczasowe widoki na pliki z ADLS Gen2
CREATE OR REPLACE TEMP VIEW bronze_orders
USING parquet
OPTIONS (
  path 'abfss://bronze@bigpharma.dfs.core.windows.net/Erp/orders'
);

CREATE OR REPLACE TEMP VIEW bronze_order_details
USING parquet
OPTIONS (
  path 'abfss://bronze@bigpharma.dfs.core.windows.net/Erp/order_details'
);

CREATE OR REPLACE TEMP VIEW silver_customers
USING parquet
OPTIONS (
  path 'abfss://silver@bigpharma.dfs.core.windows.net/d_customers'
);

-- 2. Utworzenie tabeli docelowej (jeśli nie istnieje)
CREATE TABLE IF NOT EXISTS silver_sales (
    country_id STRING,
    product_id STRING,
    shipped_date DATE,
    quantity DOUBLE,
    discount DOUBLE,
    amount DOUBLE,
    unit_price DOUBLE
)
USING DELTA
LOCATION 'abfss://silver@bigpharma.dfs.core.windows.net/f_sales/';

-- 3. Przekształcenie i zapis danych do tabeli Silver z użyciem MERGE
MERGE INTO silver_sales AS silver
USING (
    WITH orders_trunc AS (
        SELECT
            order_id,
            customer_id,
            TRUNC(order_date, 'MM') AS order_date,
            TRUNC(required_date, 'MM') AS required_date,
            TRUNC(shipped_date, 'MM') AS shipped_date
        FROM bronze_orders
    ),
    joined_orders AS (
        SELECT
            o.order_id,
            c.country_id,
            od.product_id,
            o.shipped_date,
            od.unit_price,
            od.quantity,
            od.discount,
            o.order_date
        FROM orders_trunc o
        JOIN bronze_order_details od ON o.order_id = od.order_id
        JOIN silver_customers c ON o.customer_id = c.customer_id
    ),
    latest_orders AS (
        SELECT *
        FROM (
            SELECT *,
                   ROW_NUMBER() OVER (PARTITION BY order_id ORDER BY order_date DESC) AS rn
            FROM joined_orders
        ) t
        WHERE rn = 1
    ),
    aggregated AS (
        SELECT
            country_id,
            product_id,
            shipped_date,
            SUM(quantity) AS quantity,
            SUM(discount) AS discount,
            ROUND(SUM(quantity * unit_price), 2) AS amount,
            ROUND(SUM(quantity * unit_price) / NULLIF(SUM(quantity), 0), 2) AS unit_price
        FROM latest_orders
        GROUP BY country_id, product_id, shipped_date
    )
    SELECT * FROM aggregated
) AS new_data
ON silver.country_id = new_data.country_id
   AND silver.product_id = new_data.product_id
   AND silver.shipped_date = new_data.shipped_date
WHEN MATCHED THEN
    UPDATE SET
        quantity = new_data.quantity,
        discount = new_data.discount,
        amount = new_data.amount,
        unit_price = new_data.unit_price
WHEN NOT MATCHED THEN
    INSERT (
        country_id, product_id, shipped_date,
        quantity, discount, amount, unit_price
    )
    VALUES (
        new_data.country_id, new_data.product_id, new_data.shipped_date,
        new_data.quantity, new_data.discount, new_data.amount, new_data.unit_price
    );
